verbs.description: [ARG0: south carolina lawmakers] to [V: trump] [ARG1: south carolina gov] henry mcmaster and the state congressional delegation urged president donald trump on thursday to reconsider his administration plan to shut down a half - built nuclear fuel facility in their state a federal appeals court last week allowed the energy department to go forward with plans to close the multibillion - dollar facility at the savannah river site near aiken closing the mixed oxide fuel fabrication facility could cost hundreds of jobs and waste more than 7 6 billion already spent the project is intended to reprocess weapons - grade plutonium into fuel for commercial reactors but it is billions of dollars over budget and decades away from completion white house trump tim scott brian symmes washington ap united states department of energy aiken lindsey graham writer the great atlantic pacific tea company gov henry mcmaster s c associated press sen lindsey graham columbia donald trump henry mcmaster president savannah river site meg kinnard rick perry energy department south carolina senator secretary

south carolina lawmakers to trump south carolina gov henry mcmaster and the state congressional delegation urged [ARG0: president donald trump] on thursday to [V: reconsider] [ARG1: his administration plan to shut down a half - built nuclear fuel facility in their state] a federal appeals court last week allowed the energy department to go forward with plans to close the multibillion - dollar facility at the savannah river site near aiken closing the mixed oxide fuel fabrication facility could cost hundreds of jobs and waste more than 7 6 billion already spent the project is intended to reprocess weapons - grade plutonium into fuel for commercial reactors but it is billions of dollars over budget and decades away from completion white house trump tim scott brian symmes washington ap united states department of energy aiken lindsey graham writer the great atlantic pacific tea company gov henry mcmaster s c associated press sen lindsey graham columbia donald trump henry mcmaster president savannah river site meg kinnard rick perry energy department south carolina senator secretary

south carolina lawmakers to trump south carolina gov henry mcmaster and the state congressional delegation urged president donald trump on thursday to reconsider his administration plan to [V: shut] down [ARG1: a half - built nuclear fuel facility in their state] a federal appeals court last week allowed the energy department to go forward with plans to close the multibillion - dollar facility at the savannah river site near aiken closing the mixed oxide fuel fabrication facility could cost hundreds of jobs and waste more than 7 6 billion already spent the project is intended to reprocess weapons - grade plutonium into fuel for commercial reactors but it is billions of dollars over budget and decades away from completion white house trump tim scott brian symmes washington ap united states department of energy aiken lindsey graham writer the great atlantic pacific tea company gov henry mcmaster s c associated press sen lindsey graham columbia donald trump henry mcmaster president savannah river site meg kinnard rick perry energy department south carolina senator secretary
